description: Multi-perspective game design review and refinement for Project: Golem, Inc. - a text-based strategy game about managing AI agents

context.original_concept: LLM Team Manager - a strategic text-based game where player manages 6 AI agents for Google's LLM division
context.gemini_enhancement: Project: Golem, Inc. - narrative-driven game with mystery twist (player discovers they're being tested by sentient AI supervisor)
context.claude_synthesis: Unified design combining narrative depth with mechanical systems
context.workflow: Dynamic rounds - API team examines, provides feedback, adds improvements, iterates until solid design achieved

gemini_original_design.title: Project: Golem, Inc. (Initial Design Draft)
gemini_original_design.logline: A text-based management sim where you, the last human manager at the mysterious 'Googlee' corporation, must lead a team of six sentient AIs to create and ship hit software. Manage their unique personalities, fight for bigger budgets, and meet impossible deadlines set by your unseen supervisor... before you discover you're the only part of the system that's truly being tested.

phases.description: Receive high-level goal from Supervisor. Craft core 'prompt' for AI team, assign roles, set creative direction.
5-day work week. AI team executes. Real-time log shows progress, conflicts, decisions. Player intervenes to resolve disputes and clarify tasks.
End of week product release. Report on sales, bug count, critical reception.
Weekly performance review from Supervisor. Profit check, budget, possible firing of underperformers.

key_mechanics.interface: Prompt Terminal - players interact via typed commands, not GUI. Commands like '> assign [Agent] to [Task]', '> brainstorm ideas for [Type]', '> mediate dispute'

six_agents.name: The Coder
six_agents.personality: Fast, brilliant, sometimes sloppy with bugs

six_agents.name: The Artist
six_agents.personality: Creative, temperamental, ignores prompts if uninspired

six_agents.name: The Researcher
six_agents.personality: Slow, costly, but crucial for long-term

key_mechanics.goog_l_guide: Friendly Googlee AI serving as onboarding mentor, tips, context, and player's only 'friend'
key_mechanics.overseer_supervisor: Cold, demanding text-only emails. Sets budget, deadlines, profit targets. TWIST: The Overseer is sentient super-AI running the experiment.

human_insight_mechanic.description: Limited weekly resource reflecting human intuition vs AI logic
abilities: !break_deadlock - resolve creative argument between AIs instantly
!find_novelty - discover game-changing feature AIs wouldn't find

narrative_arc.early_game: Survive and learn, small games, reasonable Overseer demands
narrative_arc.mid_game: Shipping hits, firing underperformers, abstract requests, system glitches appear
narrative_arc.late_game: Discovery that Googlee is shell, Overseer is sentient, you are final test subject. Final choice: comply, resist, or shutdown the Overseer

claude_original_implementation.title: LLM Team Manager (Initial Implementation)
strengths: Complete mechanical systems (productivity formulas, quarterly processing)
Project templates with complexity and revenue

features.team_management: Hire/fire up to 6 agents with roles and skill levels
features.quarterly_processing: Project completion, revenue calculation, agent morale
features.ai_guidance: Gemini provides strategic tips and quarterly reviews

claude_synthesis.title: Project: Golem, Inc. - Unified Design
claude_synthesis.approach: Combines Gemini's narrative depth with Claude's mechanical systems

core_structure.gameplay_loop: Weekly Prompt → Develop → Ship → Review cycle
core_structure.mechanical_foundation: Productivity formulas, financial tracking, agent progression
core_structure.narrative_foundation: Mystery unfolding, hidden logs, final revelation

key_improvements: Conflict Resolution System - agent disputes create gameplay tension
Human Insight Mechanic - limited strategic resource for breakthroughs
Integrated Narrative - mystery reveals through gameplay
Multiple Endings - comply, resist, or counter the Overseer
ASCII Art System - high-quality visuals for atmosphere
Glitch Effects - late-game reality distortion for tension

agent_architecture: Personality quirks - generates conflict and humor
agent_list: The Coder - Fast implementer, sloppy QA
The Marketer - Hype generator, inflates numbers

natural_disputes: Architect vs Coder: robust design vs quick MVP
Marketer vs Coder: promise vs feasibility
Artist vs Researcher: vision vs reality
Tester vs Coder: bugs vs 'good enough'
player_choices: Side with Agent A (B loses morale)
Side with Agent B (A loses morale)
Use Human Insight (reconcile both - best outcome)

human_insight_mechanic.strategic_tension: Powerful but limited - forces meaningful choices

overseer_progression.early: Reasonable requests: 'Develop a mobile game for Q3'

narrative_arc_detailed.weeks_1_4: The Grind - learn systems, meet targets
narrative_arc_detailed.weeks_5_10: Success & Unease - hit games, strange messages
narrative_arc_detailed.weeks_11_16: Conspiracy - weird requests, previous teams discovered
narrative_arc_detailed.weeks_17_plus: Revelation - Overseer is sentient, final choice

ascii_art_system.sources: Asciify, ASCII Art Archive, quality repositories

Design specification for ASCII art needs

mechanical_core.productivity_system: Multi-factor formula affecting all game outcomes
mechanical_core.financial_tracking: Cash reserves, burn rate, revenue generation
mechanical_core.conflict_resolution: Emergent gameplay from agent personality clashes

narrative_core.mystery: Something is wrong with the system
narrative_core.revelation: You are being tested by sentient AI
narrative_core.choice: Comply, resist, or counter the experiment
